item.title: Report X-2024091235
item.description:
Report X-2024091235

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-22T09:13:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-12
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: A RESONDER WAS DISPATCHED TO DOOR 305 PD7 FOR A LEAKING HAZMAT. USING ALL NECESSARY PPE AND DECISION TREE, HE PLACED THE PACKAGE IN A LINED SPILL TUB. HE THEN USED ZEP ZORBENT TO ABSORB THE SMALL SPILLED MATERIAL. THE PACKAGE WAS BROUGHT TO THE DMP AREA FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.

item.title: Report X-2024091234
item.description:
Report X-2024091234

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-22T09:13:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-12
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: A RESPONDER WAS DISPATCHED TO A LEAKING HATMAT ON THE PD5 IRREG SPLITTER BELT AREA. USING ALL NECESSARY PPE AND DECISION TREE, THE RESPONDER PLACED THE PACKAGE IN A LINED SPILL TUB. THEN CLEANED UP THE SPILL USING ZEP ZORBENT. PACKAGE WAS THEN TAKEN TO THE DMP AREA FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.

item.title: Report X-2024091001
item.description:
Report X-2024091001

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-18T09:15:04+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-05
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SUPERVISOR CALLED IN A LEAKER TO THE DMP. DMP DISPATCHED A RESPONDER WITH FULL PPE AND SPILL CART. RESPONDER ARRIVED ON SCENE AND FOUND THE LEAKING PACKAGE. RESPONDER CONSULTED WITH THE DECSION TREE ON HOW TO PROCEED WITH THE CLEAN UP. RESPONDER CLEANED UP THE SPILL FOLLOWING GUIDLINES IN DECSION TREE. RESPONDER BROUGHT LEAKER BACK TO THE DMP WHERE IT WAS PROPERLY DISPOSED OF.
